content.title: Rotational Angiography
content.description: 3D rotational angiography technique for vascular imaging

key_concepts.details: C-arm rotates around patient during contrast injection; reconstructs 3D images
3D visualization from multiple angles without repositioning
Cerebrovascular, visceral aneurysms, complex endovascular procedures
Motion artifact, increased contrast and radiation

content.clinical_significance: Useful for complex anatomy and treatment planning
content.statement: Rotational Angiography is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Diagnostics that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Rotational Angiography helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Rotational Angiography include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Rotational Angiography.
